book.title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
book.author: J.K. Rowling
book.description: A young boy discovers he is a wizard and enrolls in a school of magic where he uncovers a dark secret about his past.

reviews.review: ★★★★☆ - "I loved this book! It's a classic and a must-read for any fan of fantasy."
★★★☆☆ - "I enjoyed the story but found the writing a bit simplistic."
★★★★★ - "A timeless masterpiece. J.K. Rowling is a genius."

book.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
book.author: Douglas Adams
book.description: An ordinary man is whisked away on a wild adventure through space and time with the help of a travel guide and a depressed robot.

reviews.review: ★★★★★ - "A hilarious and thought-provoking journey through the universe. Douglas Adams was a master of satire."
★★☆☆☆ - "I found the humor to be hit or miss, and the plot was a bit too zany for my taste."
★★★★☆ - "A unique and entertaining read that keeps you guessing until the end."
